mapper.select: select ti.id, ti.name, ti.title, ti.price, ti.image from tb_item ti where ti.brand = (select item.brand from tb_item item where item.id = #{id}) limit 8
select ti.id, ti.name, ti.title, ti.price, ti.image from tb_item ti join tb_history th on ti.id = th.item_id join tb_user_login tul on th.user_id = tul.id where tul.id = #{id} limit 8

select ti.id, ti.name, ti.title, ti.price, ti.image, SUM(th.times) totleTimes from air.tb_item ti join air.tb_history th on ti.id = th.item_id join air.tb_subcategory ts on ti.subcategory_id = ts.id join air.tb_category tc ON ts.category_id = tc.id where tc.id = #{categoryId} group by ti.id order by totleTimes desc limit 1;

select ti.id, ti.name, ti.title, ti.price, ti.image, SUM(th.times) totleTimes from air.tb_item ti join air.tb_history th on ti.id = th.item_id join air.tb_subcategory ts on ti.subcategory_id = ts.id join air.tb_category tc ON ts.category_id = tc.id group by ti.id order by totleTimes desc limit 6;
